calendar_simulation

Class AccountManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • calendar_simulation.AccountManager

  • class AccountManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The class AccountManager handles store, read, and verify accounts information related to the calendar system.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AccountManager(java.lang.String filePath)
      Read account information if there exists such accounts, create one if there does not exist.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      (package private) boolean contains(java.lang.String name)
      Return true if there is such user.
      (package private) boolean match(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String password)
      Return true iff the user exists and the password is correct.
      (package private) int remove(java.lang.String name) 
      (package private) void set(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String password)
      set password for a user

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
